gate.learning.learners

Class SvmLibSVM

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.learning.learners.SupervisedLearner
      • gate.learning.learners.SvmLibSVM

  • public class SvmLibSVM
extends SupervisedLearner
    SVM traning using the LibSVM and SVM classification. Currently one the binary SVM classification is implemented.

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      The uneven margins parameter.
